ongoing_projects.title: Cyclone Relief Distribution
ongoing_projects.description: Providing aid to victims of natural disasters, including food, clean water, and basic necessities.

ongoing_projects.title: Winter Blanket Distribution
ongoing_projects.description: Supplying blankets to people affected by cold weather, focusing on rural and underprivileged areas.

ongoing_projects.title: Ramadan Iftar Program
ongoing_projects.description: Distributing iftar food items to the needy during the holy month of Ramadan.

ongoing_projects.title: Educational & Construction Material Support
ongoing_projects.description: Providing books, stationery, and construction materials to religious and educational institutions.

ongoing_projects.title: Seminars & Awareness Programs
ongoing_projects.description: Organizing educational and awareness seminars on health, environment, and social issues.

ongoing_projects.title: National Day Celebrations
ongoing_projects.description: Hosting cultural and educational programs to celebrate significant national events.

ongoing_projects.title: Korbani (Qurbani) Service
ongoing_projects.description: Organizing livestock sacrifice services, especially for expatriates, ensuring hygiene and environmental care.

planned_projects.title: International Standard Educational Institutions
planned_projects.description: Establishing religious and general education centers to develop a well-educated nation with strong moral values.

planned_projects.title: Hospitals & Diagnostic Centers
planned_projects.description: Setting up hospitals and diagnostic centers to provide affordable, high-quality medical services.

planned_projects.title: Publishing House
planned_projects.description: Printing and distributing books, magazines, and research journals to promote knowledge and education.

planned_projects.title: Media Organization
planned_projects.description: Creating an independent media platform to provide objective news and educational content.
